document_data.mainbody:
he Glorious Revolution occurred in the Year of the Falling Moon, 1217 DR. It was a popular uprising against Duke Bogob.
The conflict began when the oppressed workers in the fields heard the rallying cry "You have nothing to lose but your chains!" The rebellious peasants were killed by the dukes well-equipped knights.
The leaders of the uprising used heavy crossbows that bore the same name as the event. These crossbows possessed a +2 enchantment that made the weapon deadlier and guided the wielders hand toward the target. It was especially effective at hitting evil targets. Its magics also increased the wielders spell resistance.
